paper_abstract: we present a manifold-based surface construction extending the C-infinity construction of Ying and Zorin (2004). Our surfaces allow for piecewise-smooth boundaries and have an improved derivative and visual behavior. Their degree of smoothness can be controlled by the user. Two-flexibility of our surface construction is confirmed numerically for a range of local mesh configurations. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
